description: Claude Code settings for Project_init - automates permissions for safe operations

comments.allowedTools: Allowed tools - these operations don't require confirmation
comments.git_commands: Git commands are safe as they are easily reversible
comments.make_commands: Make commands are controlled through Makefile
comments.npm_commands: npm run is safe as it executes scripts from package.json
comments.read_only: Read commands (ls, cat, find) are always safe
comments.blockedTools: Dangerous commands - always require explicit confirmation
comments.dangerous: Destructive operations are always blocked automatically

notes: This file can be committed to git - it will be used by the whole team
For one-time permissions use --allowedTools flag when running
Patterns support wildcards: Bash(git *) = all git commands
More specific rules have priority over general ones

security.principle: By default block everything dangerous, allow only safe operations
security.team_sync: When changing this file - notify the team
